com.drs.gem.injector.core

Interface Container


  • public interface Container
    Interface represents Dependency Injection container. Container instance is used to declare new modules, initialize, inject dependencies into all modules declared via this container instance and obtaining fully initialized module instances.
    Author:
    Diarsid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void declareModule(String moduleInterface, String moduleImplem, GemModuleType type)
      Method to declare new module in container.
      <M extends GemModule>
      M      		 getModule(Class<M> moduleClass)
      Returns appropriate module instance that is fully initialized.
      void init()
      Start point of container's work.
      void useRecursiveInjector()
      Force container to use RecursiveInjector for module instantiation instead of default PriorityLoopInjector.

    • Method Detail

      • declareModule

        void declareModule(String moduleInterface,
                   String moduleImplem,
                   GemModuleType type)
        Method to declare new module in container.
        Parameters:
        moduleInterface - canonical name of declared module interface.
        moduleImplem - canonical name of declared module implementation class.
        type - module's type, SINGLETON or PROTOTYPE.
        See Also:
        GemModuleType

      • init

        void init()
        Start point of container's work. Container collects all information about modules and initialize all singleton modules that have been declared via this container instance.

      • useRecursiveInjector

        void useRecursiveInjector()
        Force container to use RecursiveInjector for module instantiation instead of default PriorityLoopInjector. See ModulesContainer for more usage details and Injector interface for explanation about difference between two injector types.

      • getModule

        <M extends GemModule> M getModule(Class<M> moduleClass)
        Returns appropriate module instance that is fully initialized.
        Type Parameters:
        M - actual module interface.
        Parameters:
        moduleClass - class object of actual module interface.
        Returns:
        fully initialized module.
        See Also:
        GemModule
